Race.SpecificTitle: Bayou Plaquemine GDD #12 -- 20 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Bayou Plaquemine Gravity Drainage District No. 12 Proposition
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 20 mill tax continuation for constructing, maintaining and operating gravity drainage works within and for Bayou Plaquemine Gravity Drainage District No. 12.
Race.FullText: Shall Bayou Plaquemine Gravity Drainage District No. 12 of St. Landry Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a consolidated special tax of twenty (20) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, having an estimated annual collection of $132,000, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and operating gravity drainage works within and for said District?
